# Salami and Cheese Rounds

Standard burger patties. Everything you can think of to try and stop them falling apart.

## Ingredients

* 1 bread stick
* 125g cream cheese
* 1 cup grated cheese
* &frac12; cup salami
* 2 tbsp chives
* 2 tbsp sun dried tomatoes


## Method

Chop slami, sun dried tomatoes and chives. Mix together with cheese in a bowl.

Slice bread stick into discs. Spread topping on top of discs and grill until golden.recipes/burgers
